amendment.description: To require the Assistant Secretary to submit certain materials and information to the Committee on the Judiciary of the Senate and the Inspector General of the Department of Homeland Security to submit a study to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs of the Senate.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2666 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2666 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Thune. (consideration: CR S6820; text: CR S6820) To require the Assistant Secretary to submit certain materials and information to the Committee on the Judiciary of the Senate and the Inspector General of the Department of Homeland Security to submit a study to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs of the Senate.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2666 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2666 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Thune.
